attributes.name: NtpTime
attributes.author: ClassTech
attributes.sentence: Simple sync of system clock to NTP
attributes.paragraph: This library keeps the system clock synchronized to an NTP time server.  It should not be used for precise timing.  The library attempts to set the system clock at the tick of the second, but the system clock does not reset it's millisecond counter, so it could be wrong almost a second.  But it just has a one second resolution anyway.
